text:
The half-life of a radioactive substance is 5 hours. A sample is tested and found to contain 0.48g
of the substance.

How much of the substance was present in the sample 20 hours before the sample was tested?

0.03
B 0.12g
C 1.92g
D 7.68g

An atom of lithium contains three protons and three electrons.
The nucleon number (mass number) of the atom is 7.
How many neutrons are there in the atom?

A 3 B 4 C 7 D 10
